title: Ticket #2618: EC2: Pull back launch-time into ShadowBday
description:
EC2 reports the launch time of an instance, it should be reflected into ShadowBday so that RUN_TIME is accurate in condor_q and policy can more accurately operate on instance uptime.

http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/index.html?ApiReference-query-DescribeInstances.html
